text: Phalodi Solar Power Plant is a 50 megawatt photo-voltaic power plant in Phalodi city of Rajasthan state in India. The plant was built and commissioned by Welspun Energy under the Jawaharlal Nehru National Solar Mission to promote ecologically sustainable growth. ==References== Category:Solar power in India Category:Renewable energy in India Category:Energy in Rajasthan Category:Jodhpur district
title: Phalodi Solar Power Plant
